mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense(expenseno, name, cnt, price, rdate, supplierno, managerno, resno) VALUES (expense_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{cnt}, #{price}, sysdate, #{supplierno}, #{managerno}, #{resno})
mapper.select: SELECT expenseno, name, cnt, price, rdate, supplierno, managerno, resno FROM expense WHERE managerno = #{managerno} ORDER BY expenseno ASC

SELECT e.expenseno, e.name, e.cnt, e.price, e.rdate, s.name AS supplier_name, r.resname FROM expense e INNER JOIN restaurant r ON e.resno = r.resno INNER JOIN supplier s ON e.supplierno = s.supplierno WHERE e.managerno = #{managerno} ORDER BY expenseno ASC
